meanings.definition: A type of ancient Greek measure of weight.
meanings.sent1: The merchant used an archines to weigh the spices.
meanings.sent2: The archines was a common unit of weight in ancient Greece.
meanings.sent3: The archines balanced precariously on the scale, causing a moment of tension.

meanings.definition: A type of ancient Greek measure of capacity.
